segments.text: What is my prime responsibility in daily work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your main job is serving the clients and giving them what they want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other things do I need to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd spend 30 % of your time on the computer . You may be bored with a job like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I am used to it .
segments.speaker: S1
